channel.title: Homepage-Video Video on Marlon Wiebe
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage-Video Video on Marlon Wiebe

item.title: Industries of Titan
item.description:
My first attempt at working with 3D keyframed animations in-engine for this innovative sim-strategy game by the Crypt of the Necrodancer devs.

Credits

Art - Sir Carma and Nick Gunn
Game by - Ryan Clark, Brace Yourself Games
Music - Danny Baranowsky
Audio - Joey Goddard, Power Up Audio
Editing, UI, and In-Engine Camera Work - Marlon Wiebe

Making Of

When I heard of Ryan’s secret new project, the script, basic layout, music by Danny B, had already been done for the trailer, but he wanted help with pacing and camera movement.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon DLC
item.description:
There’s something in the blood in Darkest Dungeon’s DLC…

Credits

Animation/Edit - Marlon Wiebe
Art/Direction - Chris Bourassa
Audio - Power Up Audio
Game - Red Hook Studios

Making Of

Will be posting more about this soon!

item.title: Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime
item.description:
ALERT! ALERT! Lovers HQ has been destroyed by Anti-Love! You and a friend must work together to defeat evil and restore love in this intense co-op game.

Credits

Editing/Animation - Marlon Wiebe
Art/Game - Asteroid Base
Additional Character Animation - Matt Hammill

Making Of

It was such an honour to work with Asteroid Base on this game. I’ve been a fan of Matt Hammill’s work previous to LIADS, games like the graphical text adventure Gilded Youth and sneeze-and-sneak-em-up Gesundheit! are fanastic games and they just ooze atmosphere.

item.title: Crypt of the Necrodancer
item.description:
The world’s one and only roguelike rhythm game beats it’s way into Early Access and into your heart.

Credits

Editing/Animation - Marlon Wiebe
Art/Game - Brace Yourself Games
Audio - Power Up Audio
